description:
The EC2 compatibility on shutdown_terminate flag is no longer maintained. 
We should consider to set the flag default to False.
title: broken EC2 compatibility on shutdown_terminate flag

comments.content:
The EC2 compatibility on shutdown_terminate flag is no longer maintained. 
We should consider to set the flag default to False.
